content: कुंभः [कुंभूमिं कुत्सितं वा उंभति पूरयति उंभ्-अच् शकं° <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A pitcher, water-pot, jar; इयं सुस्तनी मस्तकन्यस्तकुंभा <ls>Jag.</ls>; वर्जयेत्तादृशं मित्रं विषकुंभं पयोमुखं <ls>H. 1. 77</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 36</ls>; so कुच,° स्तन°. {@--2@} The frontal globe on the forehead of an elephant; इभकुंभ <ls>Māl. 5. 32</ls>; मत्तेभकुंभदलने भुवि संति शूराः <ls>Bh. 1. 59.</ls> {@--3@} Aquarius, the eleventh sign of the zodiac. {@--4@} A measure of grain equal to 20 droṇas; <ls>Ms. 8. 320.</ls> {@--5@} (In Yoga <ab>phil.</ab>) Closing the nostrils and mouth so as to suspend breathing. {@--6@} The paramour of a harlot. {@--7@} An urn in which the bones of dead bodies are collected. {@--8@} A kind of heart-disease. --भा A harlot, a whore. --भं A fragrant resin (गुग्गुल).
